id.description:
Class AiChat.

This class is the model for AI chats.

Class AiChatMessage.

This class is the model for AI chat messages.

Class Cluster.

This class is the model for clusters.

Class Deployment.

This class is the model for deployments.

Class DeploymentCommit.

This class is the model for deployment commits.

Class DeploymentLink.

This class is the model for deployment ingress rules.

Class Project.

This class is the model for projects.

Class Template.

This class is the model for templates.

Class TemplateDirectory.

This class is the model for template directories.

Class TemplateField.

This class is the model for template fields.

Class TemplateFieldOption.

This class is the model for template field options.

Class TemplateFile.

This class is the model for template files.

Class TemplateField.

This class is the model for template fields.

Class User.

This class is the model for the user.

items.example: The user id field is required.

network_policy_id.name: network_policy_id
network_policy_id.description: The ID of the network policy

bearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: 'Bearer {token}'
